name: Trash Panic
description:
The Trash Panic™ game adds a whole new element to puzzle video games - waste management! This PS3™ system downloadable exclusive will challenge players to be "eco-friendly" in disposing of garbage.

Throughout each stage, trash items will be dropped into a trash can that will quickly reach full capacity unless you dispose of it strategically. Act quickly -- if the trash overflows too much you lose! Each level features a giant Boss item for players to destroy in a certain amount of time, but don't just resort to any means necessary... at the end of each stage, you will be rated by how “eco-friendly” or “ego-friendly” you choose to be!

Key Features:
* 3 difficulty levels for single player
* Two game play styles:
– Eco-friendly: use biodegradable disposal methods, earns higher scores
– Ego-friendly: burn items, leaves a carbon footprint
* 6 levels plus Mission Mode
* 2 player offline multiplayer
* Online leaderboards and trophies

Trash Panic is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. © 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Trash Panic uses Havok ® © Copyright 1999-2008 Havokcom, Inc. (and its Licensors). All Rights Reserved. See www.havok.com for details.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other terms and conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

Video output in HD requires cables and an HD compatible display, both sold separately. This video will play on displays ranging from standard definition to 1080p. However, this video will output at a maximum resolution of 720p.
